s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(15):
    s = s.replace("2", "22")
    s = s.replace("3", "333")
    s = s.replace("4", "4444")
    s = s.replace("5", "55555")
    s = s.replace("6", "666666")
    s = s.replace("7", "7777777")
    s = s.replace("8", "88888888")
    s = s.replace("9", "999999999")

print(s[k - 1])

def main():
    s = input()
    k = int(input())

    for i in range(15):
        s = s.replace("2", "22")
        s = s.replace("3", "333")
        s = s.replace("4", "4444")
        s = s.replace("5", "55555")
        s = s.replace("6", "666666")
        s = s.replace("7", "7777777")
        s = s.replace("8", "88888888")
        s = s.replace("9", "999999999")

    print(s[k-1])

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(15):
    s = s.replace("2", "22")
    s = s.replace("3", "333")
    s = s.replace("4", "4444")
    s = s.replace("5", "55555")
    s = s.replace("6", "666666")
    s = s.replace("7", "7777777")
    s = s.replace("8", "88888888")
    s = s.replace("9", "999999999")

print(s[k-1])

s = input()
k = int(input())

for i in range(15):
    s = s.replace("2", "22") # 2 -> 22
    s = s.replace("3", "333") # 3 -> 333
    s = s.replace("4", "4444") # 4 -> 4444
    s = s.replace("5", "55555") # 5 -> 55555
    s = s.replace("6", "666666") # 6 -> 666666
    s = s.replace("7", "7777777") # 7 -> 7777777
    s = s.replace("8", "88888888") # 8 -> 88888888
    s = s.replace("9", "999999999") # 9 -> 999999999

print(s[k-1])
